import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { StoreDTO } from '../../models/Store'; import { StoreService } from '../../services/store.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stores', templateUrl: './stores.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stores.component.scss'] }) export class StoresComponent { stores: Array = []; constructor(private storeService: StoreService) { storeService.Stores$ .subscribe(res => this.stores=res); } }
